product_name: CamelBak Blowfish Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz. - Men's
long_description: The CamelBak Blowfish 70 fl. oz. hydration pack boasts expandable cargo capacity for rides lasting 2+ hours. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Quick Link system also lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Wide-mouthed reservoir has its own zippered compartment, making it easy to fill and access the reservoir; quick-snap reservoir cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking and can be easily shut off with a quarter turn. Air Channel back panel with breathable mesh keeps fresh air flowing across the back for enhanced ventilation and comfort. Cavernous main compartment offers plenty of storage; expansion zippered panel expands the main compartment to provide extra storage when needed. Organizing small essentials is easy thanks to the front organizer pocket; top-accessed zippered media pocket is lined to protect scratch-sensitive electronics. Adjustable shoulder straps, slider sternum strap and a removable hipbelt allow you to adjust the fit of the pack. CamelBak Blowfish 70 fl. oz. hydration pack is designed to carry a multitool, pump, spare tube, extra layers, lunch, MP3 player, phone, wallet and keys.
short_description: The CamelBak Blowfish 70 fl. oz. hydration pack boasts expandable cargo capacity for rides lasting 2+ hours.
